headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and product names. Use weight 800 for Hero, 600 for Section Headers.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, inputs, and descriptions.

mono.usage: Data metrics, pricing numbers, and technical specs.

grids.hero_tetris: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-6 p-4 md:p-8

hero_section.instruction: Use the 'Tetris' grid. Main block (col-span-8) features the 'Modern Home' image with a glassmorphism overlay for text. Side blocks feature 'Solar Calculator' teaser and 'Deal of the Day'.
hero_section.style: Immersive, high contrast, text over image with proper scrim.

solar_calculator.instruction: A standalone card or section. NOT a modal. Use a multi-step form wizard feel. Inputs for 'Monthly Bill', 'Roof Type', 'Location'. Output: 'Potential Savings' in big bold Mono font.
solar_calculator.style: Clean, functional, high-trust. Use 'tech_green' for savings numbers.

product_card.instruction: Minimalist. Image top, Title, Price, and 'Add to Cart' button that appears on hover. Show 'Efficiency Rating' badge.
product_card.style: White bg (light mode), Slate bg (dark mode). Subtle border. No heavy shadows until hover.

ai_assistant.instruction: Floating button bottom-right. Expands into a chat window. Use 'Solar Gold' for the trigger button. Chat window should use glassmorphism.
ai_assistant.style: Friendly, accessible, distinct from the rest of the UI.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
motion.scroll_reveal: Use 'framer-motion' whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }} viewport={{ once: true }}
motion.marquee: Slow, continuous scroll for brand logos or 'Why Choose Us' benefits.

hero_home.alt: Modern home with solar panels on roof

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge', 'sonner'. Configure Tailwind with the provided colors and fonts.
2. FONTS: Import 'Outfit', 'DM Sans', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Tetris' grid for the Home Page Hero. It's the signature look.
4. COMPONENTS: Create reusable 'Button', 'Card', 'Input' components using the 'visual_enhancers' styles. Do not use default HTML elements.
5. CALCULATOR: Implement the Solar Calculator logic (mocked is fine) but ensure the UI is top-tier (sliders, toggle switches, clear big numbers).
6. AI CHAT: Add the floating AI assistant. It should be present on all pages.
7. THEME: Implement the Dark/Light mode toggle. Default to Light Mode.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use the specified 'Tetris' and 'Control Room' grids.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons. Use Lucide React icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
